doc:
Richard Hale https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Hale 0 Richard Hale (November 16, 1892 – May 18, 1981) was an American opera and concert singer and later a character actor of film, stage and television. Hale's appearance usually landed him roles as either Middle Eastern or Native American characters. Richard_Hale ( November_16_,_1892 – May_18 , 1981 ) was an_American_opera_and_concert_singer and later a_character_actor of film_,_stage_and_television . Hale 's_appearance usually landed him roles as either_Middle_Eastern or Native_American_characters .
